title: The 'Meghna' Nakshi Haaram: A Pastel Gemstone Symphony
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Gold is Hallmarked for purity.
features: This Haaram features a stunning arrangement of Polki diamonds in a floral and geometric pattern. The center boasts a large pear-shaped rose quartz pendant, accented by a oval tanzanite stone above. Delicate strands of green amethyst, rose quartz drops, and freshwater pearls cascade from the main body, offering movement and a touch of whimsy. The Hyderabadi polish lends a rich, antique sheen to the gold, enhancing the vintage charm. The reverse of the piece features detailed filigree work typical of South Indian craftsmanship.
colors: Cream (Freshwater Pearls). This pastel palette is a modern interpretation of traditional color combinations.
occasions: or any modern celebration where you want to blend traditional elegance with contemporary flair. Also suitable for a Seemantham or half-saree function
especially for someone seeking a less traditional color palette.
description: This piece is a unique blend of traditional South Indian craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. The use of Polki diamonds lends an authentic, regal touch, while the pastel gemstones offer a refreshing and contemporary aesthetic. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster and enhances the vintage appeal. A true heirloom piece, this necklace is a statement of refined taste and enduring style.
